data.name: Test Subject 901
data.detailed_description:
While working your job as a security guard at a secret testing facility, something has gone terribly wrong. Everyone else is dead and now and you are the only one left. Find a way out while avoiding what lurks in the darkness around you.

Move through the facility and hide in the shadows as you plan your attempt at escape. Throw whatever you can pick up to create a distraction and stay out of sight to survive.

Give yourself nightmares with this VR horror experience.

Brought to you by SpinVR: a branch of SpinVFX, which brought you the visual effects for your favorite TV shows and films, including The Expanse, Game of Thrones, and the upcoming space thriller, Nightflyers.



Staying low and hidden will be key to your survival. Use whatever you find to obscure your visibility and avoid a line of sight at all costs, if you can...



Objects litter the rooms and halls. Toss them in strategic directions to create distractions, helping you stay concealed.



Search through the dark halls and lonely rooms of the facility to collect all the key cards needed to unlock the escape hatch.
data.about_the_game:

Staying low and hidden will be key to your survival. Use whatever you find to obscure your visibility and avoid a line of sight at all costs, if you can...

data.short_description: Trudge through haunting halls and desolate rooms, teleport through the darkness and hide in the shadows as you plan your escape. Feel your heart race as your doom looms ever closer. Find a way out before your fate is sealed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
